title: Be diligent to get alone with God
description: Sometimes people seek the Lord, and they make all the plans, and they have all the ideas.  When I was a beginner in the ministry, before I came to Brooklyn, I used to try to get a week now, or two weeks then, to wait upon the Lord.  And one time, I found out that a brother-in-law of mine and his family were going away on a vacation, and so I asked him whether I couldnâ€™t be in his house for those two weeks.  So he allowed me to if I would take care of his chickens.  Well, they were all dead by the time he came back two week later.  And his little girl said to me, â€œYou died them, didnâ€™t you?â€  Well, no.  They died by themselves.  I didnâ€™t have to do anything about it.

title: Pray And Be Alone With God
